text:
Created attachment 33565
Apache log

Hi Team,

We are using Apache 2.4.17 on AIX 7.1. Now I am setting up the production server where we have two Apache server on top of we have Radware loadbalancer.

We configured the Apache properly and when we are accessing the Apache through http it is working but when we are using the https for the loadbalancer URL it is failing by saying below error.

AH00566: request failed:invalid characters in URI
AH00276: the listener thread didn't exit

We are using SSL at laodbalancer level and our Apache server is configured with http only.

Below are the worker configuration information.

<IfModule worker.c>
  ServerLimit              600
  StartServers             200
  MaxClients               600
  MinSpareThreads           25
  MaxSpareThreads           100
  ThreadsPerChild           50
  MaxRequestsPerChild   100000
</IfModule>


KeepAlive On
KeepAliveTimeout 15
MaxKeepAliveRequests 100
Timeout 20


Can you please let me know what is wrong here.

Regards,
Rahul.
creator: rahulk@ncs.com.sg

text: bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not for support. Please do a basic investigation first or ask for help on users@httpd.apache.org or a site like serverfault until something pointing at a bug in the server can be identified.
